The Category class represents a category in a composite structure.

Constructs an empty Category.

Constructs a new Category with the specified code, name, and description.
CategoryDAO - Class in DBLayer
The CategoryDAO class provides data access methods for interacting with the database related to category operations.
CategoryDAO() - Constructor for class DBLayer.CategoryDAO
Constructs a CategoryDAO object and establishes a database connection.
CategoryDAO(Connection) - Constructor for class DBLayer.CategoryDAO
Constructs a CategoryDAO object with a specified database connection.
categoryExists(int) - Method in class DBLayer.CategoryDAO
Checks if a category with the specified ID exists in the database.
categoryNameExists(String) - Method in class DBLayer.CategoryDAO
Checks if a category with the specified name exists in the database.
CategoryTreeFrame - Class in UILayer
The CategoryTreeFrame class represents the user interface for displaying a category tree and related product information.

Constructs a CategoryTreeFrame with the necessary components and initializes the UI.
CategorywiseProducts - Class in UILayer
The CategorywiseProducts class represents the user interface for generating and displaying pie charts representing product acquisition across different categories.
CategorywiseProducts() - Constructor for class UILayer.CategorywiseProducts
Constructs a CategorywiseProducts frame with the necessary components and initializes the UI.
clear() - Method in class BusinessLayer.Cart
Clears the cart by resetting the ID and removing all items.

The Composite interface represents the common interface for all components in the Composite pattern.
connect() - Method in class BusinessLayer.DatabaseConnector
Establishes a connection to the database.
